Body:
enable = bw.wire.Wire()
reset_n = bw.wire.Wire()
shift_load = bw.wire.Wire()
data_1 = bw.wire.Wire()
data_2 = bw.wire.Wire()
data_3 = bw.wire.Wire()
data_4 = bw.wire.Wire()
data_5 = bw.wire.Wire()
data_6 = bw.wire.Wire()
data_7 = bw.wire.Wire()
data_8 = bw.wire.Wire()
data_serial = bw.wire.Wire()
clock = bw.wire.Wire()
output_1 = bw.wire.Wire()
output_2 = bw.wire.Wire()
output_3 = bw.wire.Wire()
output_4 = bw.wire.Wire()
output_5 = bw.wire.Wire()
output_6 = bw.wire.Wire()
output_7 = bw.wire.Wire()
output_8 = bw.wire.Wire()
output_serial = bw.wire.Wire()
data_bus = bw.wire.Bus8(data_1, data_2, data_3, data_4, data_5, data_6,
    data_7, data_8)
output_bus = bw.wire.Bus8(output_1, output_2, output_3, output_4, output_5,
    output_6, output_7, output_8)
a = bw.state.ShiftRegister8(enable, reset_n, shift_load, data_bus,
    data_serial, clock, output_bus, output_serial)
enable.value = 1
reset_n.value = 0
reset_n.value = 1
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
assert output_serial.value == 0
data_1.value = 1
data_2.value = 0
data_3.value = 0
data_4.value = 1
data_5.value = 1
data_6.value = 0
data_7.value = 0
data_8.value = 1
data_serial.value = 1
shift_load.value = 0
clock.value = 0
clock.value = 1
shift_load.value = 1
assert output_bus.wire_values == (1, 0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0, 1)
assert output_serial.value == 1
clock.value = 0
clock.value = 1
assert output_bus.wire_values == (1, 1, 0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0)
assert output_serial.value == 0
clock.value = 0
clock.value = 1
assert output_bus.wire_values == (1, 1, 1, 0, 0, 1, 1, 0)
assert output_serial.value == 0
reset_n.value = 0
reset_n.value = 1
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
assert output_serial.value == 0
data_1.value = 1
data_2.value = 0
data_3.value = 0
data_4.value = 1
data_5.value = 1
data_6.value = 0
data_7.value = 0
data_8.value = 1
data_serial.value = 0
shift_load.value = 0
clock.value = 0
clock.value = 1
shift_load.value = 1
assert output_bus.wire_values == (1, 0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0, 1)
assert output_serial.value == 1
clock.value = 0
clock.value = 1
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 1, 0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0)
assert output_serial.value == 0
clock.value = 0
clock.value = 1
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 1, 1, 0)
assert output_serial.value == 0
enable.value = 0
clock.value = 0
clock.value = 1
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 1, 1, 0)
assert output_serial.value == 0
enable.value = 1
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 1, 1, 0)
assert output_serial.value == 0
clock.value = 0
clock.value = 1
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 1, 1)
assert output_serial.value == 1
enable.value = 0
clock.value = 0
enable.value = 1
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 1, 1)
assert output_serial.value == 1
clock.value = 1
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 1)
assert output_serial.value == 1
print(a.__doc__)
print(a)
a(enable=1, clear_n=1, shift_load=0, data_bus=(0, 1, 0, 1, 0, 1, 0, 1),
    data_serial=0, clock=0, output_bus=None, output_serial=None)
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 1)
assert output_serial.value == 1
a(clock=1)
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 1, 0, 1, 0, 1, 0, 1)
assert output_serial.value == 1
